summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2003 TOYOTA COROLLA. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 40 MPH AND ATTEMPTING TO AVOID ANOTHER VEHICLE, THE CONTACT CRASHED HEAD ON INTO A LIGHT POLE. THE FRONTAL AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED IN OCTOBER 2015 PER THE MANUFACTURER'S AIR BAG RECALL. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED AND THERE WERE NO INJURIES REPORTED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO AN IMPOUND LOT. THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 167,000.
